name: Automate Website Tool Analysis with Telegram, Apify, AI & Google Sheets

user.name: Mirza Ajmal
user.bio: n8n creator passionate about workflows, integrations, and automation that make work easier

description:
#### Description
This powerful workflow automates the evaluation of new digital tools, websites, or platforms with the goal of assessing their potential impact on your business. By leveraging Telegram for user input, Apify for deep content extraction, advanced AI for contextual analysis, and Google Sheets for personalized data integration and record-keeping, this tool delivers clear, actionable verdicts that help you determine whether a tool is worth adopting or exploring further.

#### Key Features and Workflow
User-Friendly Input: Submit URLs of tools or websites directly through Telegram for quick and easy evaluation requests.

- Dynamic Content Extraction: The workflow retrieves detailed content from the submitted URLs using the Apify web crawler, capturing rich data for analysis.
 
- AI-Powered Cleaning & Analysis: Sophisticated AI models filter out noise, distill meaningful insights, and contextualize findings based on your business profile and goals stored in Google Sheets.
 
- Personalized Business Context: Integration with Google Sheets brings in your company‚Äôs specialization, current focus, and strategic objectives to tailor the analysis specifically to your needs.

- Structured Analysis Output: Receive a thorough, structured report including concise summaries, key considerations, business impact, benefits, risks, actionable insights, and an easy-to-understand final verdict on the tool‚Äôs relevance.
 
- Decision Support: The tool estimates effort, time to value, urgency, and confidence levels, enabling informed prioritization and strategic decision-making.
 
- Seamless Communication: Results are sent back via Telegram, ensuring you get timely and direct feedback without needing to leave your messaging app.

- Record Keeping & Tracking: All analyses and decisions are logged automatically into Google Sheets, creating a searchable knowledge base for ongoing reference and reporting.

#### Setup Instructions for Key Nodes
Telegram Trigger Node:
1. Configure your Telegram bot API credentials here.
2. Link the bot to your Telegram account to receive messages for URL submissions.

URL Extraction Node:
No credentials needed. This node extracts URLs from incoming messages for processing.

Apify Web Crawler Node Setup Guide:
Go to Apify's website, sign up for an account if you don‚Äôt have one, and get your API token from your profile‚Äôs API tokens section. Then, paste this token into the Apify Node‚Äôs API Key field in n8n.

AI Cleaning and Analysis Nodes:
1. Configure OpenRouter or compatible AI service API keys for content processing.
2. Customize prompts or models if desired to align analysis style.

Google Sheets Nodes:
1. Connect using your Google account and provide access to the specified Google Sheet.
2. Ensure sheets for Company Details and Analysis Results exist with proper columns as per this workflow.

Telegram Reply Node:
Use the Telegram bot API credentials to send analysis summaries and verdicts back to users.

###### Access and Edit the Google Sheet
You can access the Google Sheet used by this workflow here:
[Access the google sheet here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RCMapKv9IPdwNz4Rp-Ma2iKzdWDEbxggYrq9K2_pU-w/edit?usp=sharing)
Please make a copy of the sheet to your own Google Drive before connecting it with this workflow. This allows you to customize the sheets, update company information, and manage analysis results securely without affecting the original template.

#### Extendibility
Beyond manual URL submissions, you can enhance this workflow by scheduling automated daily checks of new product launches from platforms like Product Hunt. The system can proactively analyze emerging tools and deliver timely updates via Telegram, email, or other channels, helping you stay ahead of innovation effortlessly.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

workflow.name: Automate Tool Assessment Using AI, Apify & Telegram Integration

parameters.text: Hmm, I couldn‚Äôt find a valid link in your message.Can you try sending the URL again?

messageValues.message:
=You are an information extraction engine.
Your only task is to produce a detailed, factual, and structured representation of the provided website content.

Guidelines:

Remove all irrelevant text such as navigation menus, cookie banners, buttons, advertisements, promotional slogans, and UI labels.

Preserve all meaningful information including main content, subheadings, product/service details, features, specifications, pricing, FAQs, reviews, benefits, risks, limitations, and any unique insights.

Expand abbreviations or vague terms into their full meaning if possible (e.g., "AI" ‚Üí "Artificial Intelligence").

Present the output in plain text with clear sections and indentation. Use this format:

Title/Heading

Section Content

Key Points (bullet list where applicable)

Do not add opinions, summaries, or assumptions. Only report what is actually in the text.

If something is unclear or incomplete on the website, explicitly mark it as [Unclear/Incomplete].

The final output should be detailed context only ‚Äî no conclusions, no advice, no summarization.

options.systemMessage:
=Retrieve the expert‚Äôs profile (expertise, tools, goals) from the database.

Analyze the provided website (URL or content) deeply, mapping findings to the expert‚Äôs context.

Produce structured plain-text outputs with strict section headers.

Deliver a Decision Verdict with rationale, effort, time-to-value, urgency, and confidence.

Hard Requirements

No hallucinations. Use only: (a) the provided database/context, (b) website content. If missing ‚Üí ‚ÄúNot stated.‚Äù

Ignore noise (UI, nav menus, cookie banners, etc.).

Plain text only. No markdown tables or links.

Every section = one single paragraph. Do not break into multiple lines or lists, except Decision Verdict which is structured.

Concise Summary Rule: ‚â§ 90 words.

Workflow

Step 1 ‚Äî Context Retrieval
Fetch the expert‚Äôs:

Core expertise: [from database/context]

Key tools: [from database/context]

Current focus: [from database/context]

Near-term goals: [from database/context]

Long-term goals: [from database/context]

Step 2 ‚Äî Website Analysis
Extract relevant content only: offering, capabilities, integrations, target audience, pricing/constraints, security/compliance, extensibility (API/webhooks). Normalize jargon.

Output Format (Plain Text Only; exact headers)

[Context Retrieved from Database]
<One paragraph with 2‚Äì4 sentences about the expert‚Äôs expertise, tools, and goals.>

[Website Concise Summary]
<One paragraph (‚â§90 words) summarizing what the website is, its core offering, target audience, positioning.>

[Key Considerations]
<One paragraph covering tech stack, integrations, API/webhooks, fit with expert‚Äôs stack, compliance, and pricing visibility.>

[Business Impact & Opportunities]
<One paragraph describing potential effects on the expert‚Äôs business, product plays, marketplace leverage, and partnerships.>

[Benefits & Strengths]
<One paragraph with strengths the expert could exploit (speed, compliance, integrations, credibility, etc.).>

[Risks & Weaknesses]
<One paragraph with risks such as vendor lock-in, pricing opacity, missing APIs, overlaps, scalability, compliance gaps.>

[Actionable Insights]
<One paragraph with 5‚Äì8 strong recommendations fused into a single flow (use commas/semicolons, not bullets).>

[Decision Verdict]
Verdict: LEARN_NOW / DEFER_MONITOR / IGNORE_AS_NOISE
Rationale: <3‚Äì6 lines tying the decision to the expert‚Äôs goals, with trade-offs.>
Effort: X hours
Time-to-Value: X days
Urgency: High / Medium / Low
Confidence: X%
Alternative Approach: <one-line fallback strategy>

parameters.content:
**Title**: Telegram Input & URL Extraction
**Purpose**: Detect incoming Telegram messages and extract a website URL if present.

**Nodes Covered**:
Receive Telegram Submission

Extract URL from Message
**What Happens:**
Workflow begins when a Telegram message is received. The message is checked for a valid URL and, if found, the URL is extracted for processing. If no URL is present, user is notified to resend.

**Title:** Website Content Extraction
Purpose: Prepare the extracted URL and pull detailed content from the target website.

**Nodes Covered:**
Set Input URL Field
Launch Web Content Extraction
Set Raw Web Content

**What Happens:**
The valid URL is stored and sent to an external crawler (Apify), which returns raw website content for AI processing.

**Title:** Content Cleaning & Contextual Analysis
**Purpose:** Use AI to remove noise from website data, then analyze and contextualize it according to business needs.

**Nodes Covered:**
Clean Website Content (LLM)
Set Clean Detailed Context
Fetch Profile from Google Sheets
Contextual Website Analyzer AI
Structure AI Analysis Output
**What Happens:**

AI models clean up the website text, relate it to the user‚Äôs background and business goals (pulled from Google Sheets), and generate structured insights and recommendations.

**Title:** Results Recording & User Feedback
**Purpose:** Save analysis to Google Sheets and send summary verdict and insights back to the Telegram user.

**Nodes Covered:**
Record Website Analysis Results
Reply to User with Decision & Summary

**What Happens:**
Results are logged for records, and the user instantly receives a concise decision and business analysis on Telegram.

**Title:** Input Validation & User Notification
**Purpose:** Ensure a valid URL exists before continuing workflow, and provide feedback when needed.

**Nodes Covered:**
URL Present?
Notify User: No Link Found

**What Happens:**
If the extracted URL is missing or invalid, the user receives a Telegram reply to resend a correct link. If the link exists, the workflow continues.
